entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Stephen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:51 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 10.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
